name: 陳煒朋
objective: 本課程主要使學生能強化會計學的基本觀念，並以國際會計原則(IFRS)為架構，熟悉會計流程與財務報表之編製。本學期之課程內容包含現金、應收帳款、設備與無形資產、負債、股東權益、以及投資活動的會計處理，最後則是現金流量表的編制，與財務報表的運用與分析。
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Ch07 Fraud, Internal Control, and Cash
3. Ch08 Accounting for Receivables
4. Ch08 Accounting for Receivables
5. Ch09 Plant Assets, Natural Resources, and Intangible Assets
6. Ch10 Liabilities
7. Ch10 Liabilities
8. Review Ch07-10 (進度整理與複習)
9. Midterm Examination (期中考)
10. Ch11 Corporation: Organization, Share Transactions, Dividends, and Retained Earnings
11. Ch11 Corporation: Organization, Share Transactions, Dividends, and Retained Earnings
12. Ch12 Investments
13. Ch12 Investments
14. Ch13 Statement of Cash Flows
15. Ch13 Statement of Cash Flows
16. Ch14 Financial Statement Analysis
17. Review Ch11-14 (進度整理與複習)
18. Final Examination (期末考)
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam (期中考): 30%
Final Exam (期末考): 30%
Quiz (小考): 30%
Attendance (出席與課堂表現): 10%
materials:
Weygandt, J.J., P.D. Kimmel, and D.E. Kieso, (2013), Financial Accounting, IFRS Edition, John Wiley & Sons Inc. (滄海書局)
杜榮瑞、薛富井、蔡彥卿、林修勅，2013，會計學，第六版。(東華書局)
